channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Vijeo Designer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Vijeo Designer

item.title: CVE-2024-8306|2024-09-11T15:05:31.560Z -- schneider%20electric -- vijeo%20designer
item.description: CWE-269: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability exists that could cause unauthorized access, loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability of the workstation when non-admin authenticated user tries to perform privilege escalation by tampering with the binaries.
